segments.text: Johnny , have you tidied up your room yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not yet , Mom . Why are you on such a cleanliness kick anyway ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I have to remind you that your grandma is arriving tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , my God , I forgot grandma's coming !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , so this place had better be clean . You know Grandma ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ... I know I'll be killed if I pee on the toilet seat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And Steve is going to look after you until we come back .
segments.speaker: S1
